html:
Who hath declared from the beginning. The Lord asks those who worship the false gods, "Which god has been able to prophesy?" Then he answers his own question with "there is no false god that is able to give you visions [showeth], to speak to you [declareth], or who can answer your prayers [heareth your words ]."

He is righteous. The gods are challenged to prove they are worthy of worship by foretelling events by which the people can establish the gods' existence.
